name: Glass Cow Dash
description:
Glass Cow Dash is a game about a cowgirl named Wilma. She wants to become the fastest person to finish the not so popular unstable Glass Maze by charging in headfirst, literally. It's rumored there is an incredible prize if she beats the set record! What could it be? Beat the game to find out!

This game has 5 levels.

This was a solo dev game made for the Ludum Dare Game Jam 49, Unstable.

This was made using Pixel Game Maker MV.

How to Play

Use arrow keys to move. Hold and release the direction to dash Wilma in a set direction. Reach the exits to win.

The dash gauge is unstable and may change the charge randomly. Don't hit the walls too much or the entire maze will come crumbling down!

Art, SFX, Music and Game Design by Justin Raimey

https://twitter.com/Stalemeat

https://blackstreakanime.com/

https://www.deviantart.com/stalemeat

Main Theme Music by Calvin Brown

Thanks for playing!
